SEARCH
Package com.autograd

Class MicroGPT

java.lang.Object
com.autograd.MicroGPT
public class MicroGPT extends Object
MicroGPT â€” A complete GPT language model in pure Java, no dependencies.

Faithful port of Andrej Karpathy's microgpt.py art project: https://gist.github.com/karpathy/8627fe009c40f57531cb18360106ce95 And Milan's C# port: https://github.com/milanm/AutoGrad-Engine

This is the exact same algorithm behind ChatGPT, stripped to its essence. Real GPTs have billions of parameters and run on GPU clusters. This one has ~5,000 parameters and runs on a single CPU thread. But every conceptual piece is here. Everything else is "just" optimization.

  • Field Details

    • nEmbd

      static int nEmbd
      Embedding dimension (vector size). default: 16.

    • nLayer

      static int nLayer
      Number of transformer layers. default: 1.

    • blockSize

      static int blockSize
      Maximum sequence length (context window). default: 8.

    • numSteps

      static int numSteps
      Number of training steps. default: 1000.

    • nHead

      static int nHead
      Number of attention heads. default: 4.

    • learningRate

      static double learningRate
      Learning rate for Adam optimizer. default: 1e-2.

    • seed

      static long seed
      Random seed for reproducibility. default: 42.

    • headDim

      static int headDim
      Dimension of each attention head (nEmbd / nHead).

    • useGated

      static boolean useGated
      Whether to use the gated attention mechanism. default: false.

    • tokenizer

      static Tokenizer tokenizer
      The tokenizer instance for encoding/decoding text.

    • stateDict

      static Map<String,Value[][]> stateDict
      The state dictionary holding all model weights (matrices). Key: parameter name (e.g. "wte", "layer0.attn_wq"). Value: 2D array of Values.

    • parameters

      static List<Value> parameters
      Flattened list of all parameters for the optimizer.

    • rng

      static Random rng
      Random number generator.

    • matrix

      static Value[][] matrix(int nout, int nin, double std)
      Initialize matrix with random values (Gaussian distribution).
      Parameters:
      nout - Number of output rows.
      nin - Number of input columns.
      std - Standard deviation for initialization.
      Returns:
      Initialized matrix of Values.

    • gpt

      static Value[] gpt(int tokenId, int posId, List<List<Value[]>> keys, List<List<Value[]>> values)
      The GPT Forward Pass. Builds the computation graph for a single token's prediction.
      Parameters:
      tokenId - Current token ID.
      posId - Current position ID.
      keys - KV Capture for Keys (for attention).
      values - KV Capture for Values (for attention).
      Returns:
      Logits (raw scores) for the next token.

    • gptGated

      static Value[] gptGated(int tokenId, int posId, List<List<Value[]>> keys, List<List<Value[]>> values)
      The GPT Forward Pass with Gated Attention.
      Parameters:
      tokenId - Current token ID.
      posId - Current position ID.
      keys - KV Capture for Keys.
      values - KV Capture for Values.
      Returns:
      Logits (raw scores) for the next token.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Main entry point. Configures, trains, and runs the MicroGPT model.
      Parameters:
      args - Command line arguments.
      Throws:
      IOException - If dataset download fails.
      InterruptedException - If dataset download is interrupted.

    • train

      static void train(List<String> docs)
      Training Loop. Runs the forward pass, calculates loss, performs backpropagation, and updates weights.
      Parameters:
      docs - List of training documents.

    • generate

      static void generate(int numSamples)
      Generation Loop. Generates new text by sampling from the model.
      Parameters:
      numSamples - Number of samples to generate.
